title: Filthy Little Pretties
description: “If Gossip Girl and Cruel Intentions had a baby, this book would be it!”Donovan Kennedy is the girl dreams are made of.  Five years ago, she was our best friend. Our moral compass. The girl that held our hands everywhere we went. We were young. Innocent. Nothing could touch us — not even heartache. That was then. Now she’s back. All grown up. With red lips and long legs — a challenge waiting to be accepted. A prize that’ll turn our world upside down. Brothers turned to enemies. Friendships decimated. Lies told.Hearts torn apart. Prep school’s never been so scandalous.Trilina Pucci brings you an addictive, sexy high school romance, packed with off the chart chemistry, and raw emotional angst.
author: Trilina Pucci
